00033 #ifndef BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION
00034 
00035         template<class T>
00036         struct decorated_type
00037         {
00038                 static by_value<T> t;
00039                 static inline by_value<T>& get() { return /*by_value<T>()*/t; }
00040         };
00041 
00042         template<class T>
00043         by_value<T> decorated_type<T>::t;
00044 
00045         template<class T>
00046         struct decorated_type<T*>
00047         {
00048                 static by_pointer<T> t;
00049                 static inline by_pointer<T>& get() { return /*by_pointer<T>()*/t; }
00050         };
00051 
00052         template<class T>
00053         by_pointer<T> decorated_type<T*>::t;
00054 
00055         template<class T>
00056         struct decorated_type<const T*>
00057         {
00058                 static by_const_pointer<T> t;
00059                 static inline by_const_pointer<T> get() { return /*by_const_pointer<T>()*/t; }
00060         };
00061 
00062         template<class T>
00063         by_const_pointer<T> decorated_type<const T*>::t;
00064 
00065         template<class T>
00066         struct decorated_type<const T* const>
00067         {
00068                 static by_const_pointer<T> t;
00069                 static inline by_const_pointer<T>& get() { return /*by_const_pointer<T>()*/t; }
00070         };
00071 
00072         template<class T>
00073         by_const_pointer<T> decorated_type<const T* const>::t;
00074 
00075         template<class T>
00076         struct decorated_type<T&>
00077         {
00078                 static by_reference<T> t;
00079                 static inline by_reference<T>& get() { return /*by_reference<T>()*/t; }
00080         };
00081 
00082         template<class T>
00083         by_reference<T> decorated_type<T&>::t;
00084 
00085         template<class T>
00086         struct decorated_type<const T&>
00087         {
00088                 static by_const_reference<T> t;
00089                 static inline by_const_reference<T>& get() { return /*by_const_reference<T>()*/t; }
00090         };
00091 
00092         template<class T>
00093         by_const_reference<T> decorated_type<const T&>::t;

00095         #define LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(t) luabind::detail::decorated_type<t>::get()

00103                 LUABIND_ANONYMOUS_FIX char decorated_type_array[64];

00106         template<class T>
00107         struct decorated_type_cref_impl
00108         {
00109 #if defined(BOOST_MSVC) && BOOST_MSVC == 1200
00110                 template<class U>
00111                 static by_const_reference<U> get(const U&)
00112                 {
00113                         return by_const_reference<U>();
00114                 }
00115                 static T data() { return reinterpret_cast<T>(decorated_type_array); }
00116 #else
00117         
00118                 static void(*data())(T)
00119                 { return (void(*)(T))0; }
00120 
00121                 template<class U>
00122                 static by_const_reference<U> get(void(*f)(const U&))
00123                 { return by_const_reference<U>(); }
00124 #endif
00125         };
00126

00128         struct decorated_type_ref_impl
00129         {
00130 #if defined(BOOST_MSVC) && BOOST_MSVC == 1200
00131                 template<class U>
00132                 static by_reference<U> get(U&)
00133                 {
00134                         return by_reference<U>();
00135                 }
00136                 static T data() { return reinterpret_cast<T>(decorated_type_array); }
00137 #else
00138                 static void(*data())(T)
00139                 { return (void(*)(T))0; }
00140 
00141                 template<class U>
00142                 static by_reference<U> get(void(*)(U&))
00143                 { return by_reference<U>(); }
00144 #endif
00145         };

00159                 { return (void(*)(T))0; }

00164 #endif
00165         };

00185         };

00188         struct decorated_type_value_impl
00189         {
00190 #if defined(BOOST_MSVC) && BOOST_MSVC == 1200
00191                 template<class U>
00192                 static by_value<U> get(U&)
00193                 {
00194                         return by_value<U>();
00195                 }
00196                 static T& data() { return reinterpret_cast<T&>(decorated_type_array); }
00197 #else
00198                 static void(*data())(T&)
00199                 { return (void(*)(T&))0; }
00200 
00201                 template<class U>
00202                 static by_value<U> get(void(*)(U&))
00203                 { return by_value<U>(); }
00204 #endif
00205         };
00206 
00207         template<>
00208         struct decorated_type_value_impl<void>
00209         {
00210                 static by_value<void> get(int)
00211                 {
00212                         return by_value<void>();
00213                 }
00214                 static int data() { return 0; }
00215         };
00216 
00217         template<class T>
00218         struct decorated_type_array_impl
00219         {
00220                 template<class U>
00221                 static by_pointer<U> get(U*)
00222                 {
00223                         return by_pointer<U>();
00224                 }
00225 
00226                 template<class U>
00227                 static by_pointer<U> get(void(*)(U))
00228                 { return by_pointer<U>(); }
00229 
00230                 static T& data() { return reinterpret_cast<T&>(decorated_type_array); }
00231         };

00233         template<class T>
00234         struct decorated_type
00235 //              : boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_array<T>
00236 //                      ,       decorated_type_array_impl<T>
00237                 :               boost::mpl::if_<luabind::detail::is_const_reference<T>
00238                                         , decorated_type_cref_impl<T>
00239                                         , typename boost::mpl::if_<luabind::detail::is_nonconst_reference<T>
00240                                                 , decorated_type_ref_impl<T>
00241                                                 , typename boost::mpl::if_<luabind::detail::is_nonconst_pointer<T>
00242                                                         , decorated_type_ptr_impl<T>
00243                                                         , typename boost::mpl::if_<luabind::detail::is_const_pointer<T>
00244                                                                 , decorated_type_cptr_impl<T>
00245                                                                 , decorated_type_value_impl<T>
00246                                         >::type
00247                                 >::type
00248                         >::type
00249                 >::type
00250 //      >::type
00251         {
00252         };

00257 //      #define LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(t) luabind::detail::decorated_type<t>::get((void(*)(type<t>))0)
